headline: SLB Enters Collaboration Agreement to Accelerate New Digital Solutions
summary: HOUSTON, December 11, 2025--Global energy technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) signed a strategic collaboration agreement with Shell to develop digital and AI solutions that drive measurable performance and efficiency gains across upstream operations for the company and the wider industry.

content.title: SLB Enters Collaboration Agreement to Accelerate New Digital Solutions
content.summary: HOUSTON, December 11, 2025--Global energy technology company SLB (NYSE: SLB) signed a strategic collaboration agreement with Shell to develop digital and AI solutions that drive measurable performance and efficiency gains across upstream operations for the company and the wider industry.

thumbnail.caption: The collaboration has the ambition to develop agentic AI-powered solutions that will accelerate and amplify the capabilities of technical experts and decision makers. The aim is to develop and deploy an open data and AI infrastructure that unifies data and workflows across subsurface, well construction and production in a secure digital environment, using SLB’s Lumi™ data and AI platform.

headline: SLB, Shell partner to develop AI-powered solutions for energy industry
summary: SLB said on Thursday ​that it was ‌partnering with Shell to develop ‌digital and artificial intelligence tools aimed at improving performance and ⁠efficiency across ‌upstream operations. Shell and SLB will develop ‍agentic AI-powered solutions designed to enhance the capabilities ​of technical experts and ‌decision makers for Shell as well as the wider energy industry. The deal extends a ⁠long-standing partnership ​between the two ​companies, after they partnered to deploy ‍SLB's subsurface ⁠software, Petrel, across the London-listed company's ⁠assets worldwide.
